front.title: Policies in a Generic AAA Environment

abstract.t: In this document a formal model of a policy is presented in thecontext of a generic AAA environment. We will focus our attention onthat kind of policy that is evaluated in response to a request of auser [OBJMSG]. That policy will determine all requirements that needto be fulfilled before the service asked for will be delivered. Wewill introduce the concept of a Driving Policy.
